description: Below is a list of projects that Georgetown Disruptive Tech has developed. If you would like to get involved with them, please reach out and let us know.

programs.title: Rotogravure
programs.description: Rotogravure is an all-in-one content management system for college newspapers and daily's. Originally developed for The Hoya, Georgetown's oldest newspaper, Rotogravure is now licensed out to colleges all around the country.
programs.joining: With the project being under active development, we would love any help we can get. If you are interested in becoming part of the team, please contact 'wpm45@georgetown.edu'.
